title: ISSS608
text: Welcome to ISSS608 Visual Analytics and Applications.

title: About
text: I am Hong Yan. This is the course page of ISSS608 whereby I share my Hands-on Exercises, In-class Exercises, Take-home Exercises and Project.

title: Hands-on Exercise 00: Working with tidyverse
text:
Getting started
Loading tidyverse onto r environment by using the code chunk below.

pacman::p_load(tidyverse)

Importing data
Code chunk below uses read_csv() of readr to import REALIS2019.csv into r environment as a tribble data. frame.

realis2019 <- read_csv("data/REALIS2019.csv")
